arguments.text: I'm not dependent on Landlord's decisions (can't be kicked out)
It's an asset (something that I — partially — own)
The combined amount of Monthly Rent, Monthly Service Charge and Mortgage is usually lower than simply renting
It will force me to be more proactive and earn more money
I'll be paying much more than I'm at the moment (in rent)
Lower mobility. It will be more difficult to move towns and I'll have to try and find jobs near a specific area
It's not guaranteed I can get a mortgage
